action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill requires residential mortgage servicers receiving COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) economic aid to report monthly on all serviced residential mortgage loans, including information on loan performance and forbearances.
